title: FS T206 Red Hindu Duffy PSA 2  (better looking than grade)

posts.post_title: FS T206 Red Hindu Duffy PSA 2  (better looking than grade)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I need to put a little loot together.  Anyone need a Red Hindu HOFer that looks way better than the grade?
$2750 delivered

I may consider trade with cash offers for other T HOFers with non Piedmont and SC backs if no buyers come out.

Thanks for looking,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Best of luck.
SGL

Always great to get a kind word from team Levy!
I hope you all are doing well,
Bob
Pretty card. I need to find a decent looking 1, common player for about $700-$800. If you happen to have anything like that, im all ears!
